page.title: 07WORMBRIDGE CHURCH
page.content: The{parish church}of St Peter, Wormbridge, is one of thirteen served by the Ewyas Harold team ministry, which comprises a{team rector,}a team vicar and a curate. Services are held in the church once every three weeks, by the clergy in rotation. The{Book of {Common Prayer}services of Mattins, Evensong and Holy Communion are used. There are about three funerals and two christenings each year, but no weddings have taken place during the past three years. About 15 people attend services regularly, at {Christmas and Harvest Time}there are about 100 in church. Historically the church has had links with its neighbour at St.Devereux. Each church appoints its own churchwardens but there is a joint {PCC,}with representation on the Abbeydone Deanery synod.
